name: Send an Email message from a new row in a Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet
description:
This template allows you to send an Email message when a new row in your Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet is added.

Your Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet has to contain headers. The template uses [this worksheet](https://1drv.ms/x/s!AjJKBs6vWrtygSW4rkVxgEFSbKw_?e=vl1PiZ).
